Params: {3: "A book with a four-winged white raven engraved on its cover slowly materializes in Chaos' hand."}
{3: 'Light gray curves twist and intertwine, forming lines of complex text. Bowing her head, she stares at the heavy tome.'}
{3: 'The lonely human opens the weighty tome.'}
{3: 'Let me see the hardships you have endured...'}
{3: 'Let me see if there exists a new "answer"...'}
{3: 'And why your civilization has been reduced to you alone.'}
